subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance debt request, we are ready to lend money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire THIS EVENING):
$235,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://swimaunland.com/
